&#3928;&#3910;&#3954;&#3851;&#3928;: [845] mig chu/ ... dga' drags nas mchi ma shor ba/ ... dga' spro'i mchi ma 'khor ba/ ... sdug kyang mchi ma mi gtong/ ... ming gi rnam grangs la ngus skul dang/ ngus byung/ mchi thigs/ mig chu bcas so/
* [ngus skul, ngus byung, mchi thigs, mig chu]
*; ex {mig nas mchi ma g.yo bzhin} with * streaming down their faces
